    • Method Detail

      • get

        NodeStatus get(String nodeId,
             String source)
        Returns connectivity, heartbeat, and version information about a fabric node (host or edge). Note that the LCP connectivity status remains down until after the fabric node has been added as a transpot node and the NSX host switch has been successfully installed. See POST /api/v1/transport-nodes. This api is deprecated, use GET /api/v1/transport-nodes//status to get status information of a node with constraint FN is converted to TN.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation will be reported as a method return value.

        Parameters:
        nodeId - (required)
        source - Data source type. (optional)
        Returns:
        com.vmware.nsx.model.NodeStatus
        Throws:
        ServiceUnavailable - Service Unavailable
        InvalidRequest - Bad Request, Precondition Failed
        InternalServerError - Internal Server Error
        Unauthorized - Forbidden
        NotFound - Not Found

      • get

        NodeStatus get(String nodeId,
             String source,
             InvocationConfig invocationConfig)
        Returns connectivity, heartbeat, and version information about a fabric node (host or edge). Note that the LCP connectivity status remains down until after the fabric node has been added as a transpot node and the NSX host switch has been successfully installed. See POST /api/v1/transport-nodes. This api is deprecated, use GET /api/v1/transport-nodes//status to get status information of a node with constraint FN is converted to TN.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation will be reported as a method return value. Use invocationConfig to specify configuration for this particular invocation.

        Parameters:

        source - Data source type. (optional)

        void get(String nodeId,
       String source,
       AsyncCallback<NodeStatus> asyncCallback)
        Returns connectivity, heartbeat, and version information about a fabric node (host or edge). Note that the LCP connectivity status remains down until after the fabric node has been added as a transpot node and the NSX host switch has been successfully installed. See POST /api/v1/transport-nodes. This api is deprecated, use GET /api/v1/transport-nodes//status to get status information of a node with constraint FN is converted to TN.

        Asynchronous method overload. Result of the invocation will be reported via the specified asyncCallback.

        Invocation Result:
        com.vmware.nsx.model.NodeStatus

        Operation Errors:
        ServiceUnavailable - Service Unavailable
        InvalidRequest - Bad Request, Precondition Failed
        InternalServerError - Internal Server Error
        Unauthorized - Forbidden

      • getall

        NodeStatusListResult getall(String nodeIds)
        Returns connectivity, heartbeat, and version information about all fabric nodes (host or edge). This api is deprecated as part of FN+TN unification. Please use Transport Node Status API /transport-nodes//status to get status information of a node and to get all transport nodes ids use GET /transport-nodes.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation will be reported as a method return value.

        Parameters:
        nodeIds - List of requested Nodes. (required)
        Returns:
        com.vmware.nsx.model.NodeStatusListResult
        Throws:
        ServiceUnavailable - Service Unavailable
        InvalidRequest - Bad Request, Precondition Failed
        InternalServerError - Internal Server Error
        Unauthorized - Forbidden
        NotFound - Not Found

      • getall

        NodeStatusListResult getall(String nodeIds,
                          InvocationConfig invocationConfig)
        Returns connectivity, heartbeat, and version information about all fabric nodes (host or edge). This api is deprecated as part of FN+TN unification. Please use Transport Node Status API /transport-nodes//status to get status information of a node and to get all transport nodes ids use GET /transport-nodes.

        Synchronous method overload. Result of the invocation will be reported as a method return value. Use invocationConfig to specify configuration for this particular invocation.

        Parameters:
        nodeIds - List of requested Nodes. (required)
        invocationConfig - Configuration for the method invocation.
        Returns:
        com.vmware.nsx.model.NodeStatusListResult
        Throws:

        InvalidRequest - Bad Request, Precondition Failed
        InternalServerError - Internal Server Error
        Unauthorized - Forbidden
        NotFound - Not Found

          AsyncCallback<NodeStatusListResult> asyncCallback)
        Returns connectivity, heartbeat, and version information about all fabric nodes (host or edge). This api is deprecated as part of FN+TN unification. Please use Transport Node Status API /transport-nodes//status to get status information of a node and to get all transport nodes ids use GET /transport-nodes.

      • getall
